welcome.firstParagraph: Thanks for downloading $app, an open-source app that will help you managing your TOTPs (Time based One Time Password) with ease.
welcome.secondParagraph: In the following steps you will be able to configure it to match your needs.
welcome.thirdParagraph: I hope you will enjoy using this app as much as I have enjoyed creating it !

logIn.title: Synchronize your TOTPs
logIn.firstParagraph: Click on the "Log in" button below to be able synchronize your TOTPs between your devices.
logIn.thirdParagraph: Note that, if you enable this option, we will have to limit you to $limit TOTPs in order to prevent excessive server usage.
logIn.fourthParagraph: This limit can be removed at any time by subscribing to the Contributor Plan in the $app settings.

password.title: Keep your data safe
password.firstParagraph: In order to keep your data safe and secure, we need you to define a master password.
password.secondParagraph: This password will be used to encrypt your data and will never be sent to any remote server.
password.thirdParagraph: Therefore, if you forget it we will not be able to recover it for you. Make sure to store it somewhere safe.
